explains: v. 提拔，提升；抬起，提起；提高，增加；使情绪高昂，使兴高采烈

sentences.en: Even better would be to help elevate notions of beauty beyond the material standards of a particular industry.
sentences.cn: 更好的办法是帮助提升美的概念，超越特定行业的物质标准。

sentences.en: I built a platform to elevate the bed.
sentences.cn: 我搭了一个台子把床抬高了。

sentences.en: Emotional stress can elevate blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 情绪紧张会使血压升高。
